headers.description: Displays generated meta tags on the page encoding: title, keywords, description. And connects all the necessary scripts. Placed in the template between the <head> tags. This tag is required in the template

jsfiles.description: Shows all the involved JS scripts which are used by DLE in the specific area of the template. With this tag you can, for example, transfer all the JS scripts to the bottom of the page to speed up the loading and rendering of your pages. This tag is optional, and if it is not in the template, all the scripts will be connected to the tag {headers}, as before. Attention! If you move the script embedding, you should keep in mind that the {AJAX} tag should also be placed below the {jsfiles} tag. Also, you should consider the work of all third-party scripts in the template if they use Jquery library for example. They should not run until all the scripts will be embedded. We strongly recommend that beginners do not use this tag, as it is designed for experienced webmasters who have experience in working with JS scripts

THEME.description: The path to the selected template

login:home.description: Panel for users login and registration

changeskin.description: Form for changing the website skin

topnews.description: Displays the highest-rated articles that have been added in the last month

info.description: Displays the service information if necessary. The tag is required in the template

content.description: Displays the website content itself: news, feedback, registration, etc., so it is the main block. This tag is required in the template except the rare cases, depending on the required features of the site

body: {custom id="${1:1}" category="${2:1}" author="${3:author-name}" days="${4:days-number}" template="${5:template-name}" available="${6|global,main,date,cat,showfull,search,userinfo,register,stats,pm,feedback,favorites,newposts,addnews,lastnews,lastcomments,lostpassword,static,catalog,alltags,tags,allnews|}" navigation="${7|no,yes|}" from="${8:0}" limit="${9:10}" fixed="${10|no,yes|}" order="${11|date,editdate,rating,reads,comments,title,rand,id_as_list|}" sort="${12|desc,asc|}" cache="${13|no,yes|}" xfields="${14:value1,value2}" idexclude="${15:article IDs list}" categoryexclude="${16:category list}" tags="${17:news,templates}" authorexclude="${18:admin,test}" catalogexclude="{19:a,b}" xfieldsexclude="${20:value1,value2}"}
custom:all.description: tag is responsible for the display of the article in a custom format

body: {custom category="${2:1}" template="${5:template-name}" available="${6|global,main,date,cat,showfull,search,userinfo,register,stats,pm,feedback,favorites,newposts,addnews,lastnews,lastcomments,lostpassword,static,catalog,alltags,tags,allnews|}" navigation="${7|no,yes|}" from="${8:0}" limit="${9:10}" order="${11|date,editdate,rating,reads,comments,title,rand,id_as_list|}" sort="${12|desc,asc|}" cache="${13|no,yes|}"}
custom:popular.description: tag is responsible for the display of the article in a custom format

available.description: displays the text enclosed in the tag if the specified section of the website is viewed

AJAX.description: Connects all the necessary scripts for DLE and AJAX. The connection is required and it is recommended to be placed on top of the page, just after <body> tag. This tag is required in the template

group if.description: Displays the text for a certain user group. Where X is a list of user groups IDs separated by commas

category:if.description: Designed to display text when the user is in X category. Where X is the ID of your category. It is allowed to specify categories separated by commas

banner.description: This tag is used to display advertising information on the website. The very name for the banner is set in a special module in the Administration Panel

inform.description: This tag is used to display the RSS informers and news from other websites. Name and all the settings for the tag are set in the Administration Panel

not-category.description: Designed to display text when the user is anywhere, except the X category. Where X is the ID of your search. It is allowed to specify categories separated by commas

not-group.description: Displays the text for any user group except the specified one. Where X is a list of user groups IDs separated by commas for which the information will not be displayed

page-count.description: Displays the enclosed text if the user is at a certain page of the news navigation, regardless of the section of the website, where 1,2,3 are the navigation page numbers

not-page-count.description: Displays the enclosed text on any page except the specified ones

news.description: Displays the enclosed text if the user views the full version of the article specified in the tag, where 1,2,3 are the article IDs

not-news.description: Displays text on any page except the news pages specified in the tag

tags:if.description: Displays the enclosed text when a visitor views the page with the listed keywords from the tag cloud, where tag1, tag2, tag3 are keywords from the tag cloud

not-tags.description: Displays text on any page except the specified ones

related-news.description: Displays related news block when viewing the full article

vk.description: Displays the enclosed text if authorization using VK network is enabled

vk_url.description: Displays the URL link to log in to VK

odnoklassniki.description: Displays the enclosed text if authorization using Odnoklassniki network is enabled

odnoklassniki_url.description: Displays the URL link to log in to Odnoklassniki

facebook.description: Displays the enclosed text if authorization using Facebook is enabled

facebook_url.description: Displays the URL link to log in to Facebook

google.description: Displays the enclosed text if authorization using Google is enabled

google_url.description: Displays the URL link to log in to Google

mailru.description: Displays the enclosed text if authorization using Mail.ru is enabled

mailru_url.description: Displays the URL link to log in to Mail.ru

yandex.description: Displays the enclosed text if authorization using Yandex is enabled

yandex_url.description: Displays the URL link to log in to Yandex

xfvalue.description: Displays the value of extra field "x", where "x" is the name of the extra field

xfgiven.description: Displays the extra field "x" if it is not empty. If the field has no value then the text is simply not displayed

xfnotgiven.description: Displays the enclosed text if extra field has not been set when publishing the article, where "х" is the name of the extra field

ifxfvalue.description: Displays the enclosed text if the extra field value matches the specified value, where tagmane is a name of the extra field, and tagvalue is its value

ifxfvalue not.description: Text between them will be displayed if the extra field value does not match the specified value, where tagmane is a name of the extra field, and tagvalue is its value

catmenu.description: Displays a menu of the categories of the site. The design of the menu is in the template categorymenu.tpl

catnewscount.description: Displays the number of articles within a certain category, where X stands for ID of a needed category

category-id.description: Display the ID of the category viewed by the visitor. This tag will be useful when organizing the menu on the site and when you need to quickly reassign any CSS classes or the names of template files, when you edit articles display templates

category-title.description: Display the name of the category viewed by the visitor. This tag will be useful when you need to display the name of the category you are viewing

category-description.description: Display the category description on the site when the user views the category. It is also available when displaying full descriptions

page-title.description: Display specified in the section "Titles, descriptions, meta tags" title for the page

page-description.description: Displays specified in the section "Titles, descriptions, meta tags" description for the page

page-title if.description: Displays the enclosed text if page title was specified in "Headers, descriptions, meta tags" for a viewed page

not-page-title.description: Displays the enclosed text if page title was not specified in "Headers, descriptions, meta tags" for a viewed page

page-description if.description: Displays the enclosed text if page description was specified in "Headers, descriptions, meta tags" for a viewed page

not-page-description.description: The enclosed text is displayed if the description of the viewed page was not specified

include.description: You can also include one template into another using this tag.Tags of the connectable template must be the same as those which are allowed in the template which is used to include that file. For example, if my_block.tpl connects into main.tpl, then tags that are allowed in main.tpl will be working in this file

lostpassword-link.description: Link to the password recovery page

logout-link.description: Link to log out the user form the website

pm-link.description: Link to this personal messages page

new-pm.description: The number of new personal messages

all-pm.description: The total number of personal messages

favorite-count.description: The number of news added to Favorites list on the website

admin-link if.description: Displays text in the tags if the user has access to the Administration Panel

addnews-link.description: Link to the page of adding news on the website

favorites-link.description: Link to the user's Favorites list

newposts-link.description: Link to the list of unread news since his/her last visit

group-icon.description: Displays the icon of a user group

login-method.description: Displays what the user should enter to log in depending on what type of authorization is set in script settings: login or e-mail

group.description: Displays the name of the user group where the user is currently belongs to

news-id.description: Article ID. This ID is used to store this article in the database

short-story:limit.description: Displays the article annotation text without HTML formatting limited by X number of symbols

date.description: Publication date. The date format can be configured in system settings

rating:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if article rating is enabled and hides the contents if it was disabled when adding the article

rating-type-1.description: Displays the enclosed text if the first 'Rating' type was enabled in script settings

rating-type-2.description: Displays the enclosed text if the second rating type 'Likes only' was enabled in script settings

rating-type-3.description: Displays the enclosed text if the third rating type 'Like' or 'Dislike' was enabled in script settings

rating-minus.description: Displays the enclosed text as a link to dislike the article. This link is displayed if the third rating type is used

rating-plus.description: Displays the enclosed text as a link to like the article. This link is displayed if the third rating type is used

vote-num.description: Displays the number of users who rated this article

comments-num.description: Displays the number of comments for this article

category-icon.description: Link to the category icon. Note, only path to the image is displayed. You should organize its display by yourself, for example

views.description: Number of views of the article

favorites.description: Link to add or remove from Favorites

add-favorites.description: Link to add the article to Favorites list on the website

del-favorites.description: Link to remove the article from Favorites list on the website

link-category.description: Link to the list of categories where the article belongs to

full-link:if.description: Link to the full article, for example [full-link]more...[/full-link]

com-link.description: Link to comments to this article. Displayed if comments are allowed

xfvalue:limit.description: Displays the article annotation text without HTML formatting limited by X2 number of symbols. Text is limited to the last logical word. For example, [xfvalue_test limit="50"] shows the first 50 symbols of the extra field value named test

xfvalue_thumb.description: This tag can be used only if extra field has type "Image". The tag displays only the URL for the thumbnails of the uploaded image, where "х" is the name of the extra field

xfvalue_image.description: This tag can be used only if extra field has type "Image". The tag displays only the URL for the full size image of the uploaded image, where "х" is the name of the extra field

xfvalue image.description: Display the uploaded images separately for extra fields of "Image Gallery" type, where "X" is the name of the extra field, and "Nr" is the number of image from the gallery. For example, if you apply [xfvalue_test image="2"], then image number two will be displayed that loaded into an additional field named "test"

tags.description: Displays clickable keywords of the article

full-link.description: Displays the full permanent address of the article

edit-date:if.description: Displays the text if the text or the article has been edited

edit-date.description: Displays the date when the article has been edited

editor:story.description: Displays the login of user who edited the article

edit-reason:if.description: Displays the text if edit reason has been specified

date:format.description: Displays the date in the specified format. It allows you to display both the full date and its separate parts. The date format is set in accordance with the PHP format. For example, {date=d} tag displays the day of the article or comment publication, and {date=F} tag displays the name of the month. {date=d-m-Y H:i} displays the full date and time

approve.description: Displayed only when a user is viewing his/her profile and shows the status of his/her news that are awaiting moderation

fixed.description: Displays the enclosed text if this article is fixed

not-fixed.description: Displays the enclosed text if this article is not fixed

day-news.description: Displays the link to all the news published in the same day as the given article. This tag can be used in conjunction with {date}

catlist.description: Displays the enclosed text if the article belongs to the specified categories

not-catlist.description: Displays the enclosed text if the article does not belong to the specified categories

login.description: Displays the name of the user who added the article as a simple text without a link to his profile

poll:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if this publication has a voting

poll.description: Displays the voting of this article

not-poll.description: Displays the enclosed text if  if this publication has no voting

profile.description: Displays the link to the article's author profile, without the use of pop-up miniprofile window

complaint.description: Displays the enclosed text as a link to writing a complaint to the article

category-url.description: Displays the full URL to the category where the article belongs to. This tag displays only the URL in its pure form, without any formatting or ready reference

comments:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if there are comments for this article

not-comments.description: Displays the enclosed text if there are no comments for this article

image-.description: Displays the URL of images that are in the article annotation, where x is the number of picture in the article. For example,{image-1} will display URL of the first image in the article annotation

image-:if.description: Displays the enclosed text only if there is an image number X in the article

declination.description: Changes endings according to the specified number. X is a number and "text" is a word with its endings. Endings are specified separated by "|" symbol. This tag is useful to be used with other tags that display, for example, number of views of the article or number of comments. For example, [declination={comments-num}]commen|t|ts[/declination] displays the following, depending on the number of comments: "comment", "comments"

newscount.description: Displays the enclosed text if the article number X is shown, where X is the number of the displayed article. For example,[newscount=1] text [/newscount] displays the text when the first article on the page is shown

not-newscount.description: Displays the enclosed text when any article is shown except the article number X. This tag is useful if you want to display any design elements in all the articles, except the specified ones. For example, if you need not show something in the first article on the page

full-story:limit.description: Displays the full article text without HTML formatting limited by X number of symbols

pages:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if the article consists of few pages using {PАGEBREAK} tag, and removes the text from it if it consists of one page

comments.description: Displays comments to this article. This tag will be useful for those who need to post comments on the page of the full article. This tag is not required. In its absence the comments will be automatically located below the full article

addcomments.description: Displays the Add comments form. In conjunction with a new {comments} tag you can place Add comments form both above and below the comments. This tag is not required. In its absence the comments will be automatically located below the full article

navigation.description: Displays the comments navigation if there are several pages with ocmments. In conjunction with a new {comments} tag you can place navigation both above and below the comments. This tag is not required. In its absence the navigation will be automatically located below the full article

fullimage.description: Displays the URL of the image which is in full article, where "x" is the number of the picture in the article

fullimage:if.description: Displays the enclosed text only if there is the image number "x" in the article

comments-subscribe.description: Text between them is displayed as a link to the article comments subscription

next-url:if.description: display enclosed text if article has the next article

next-url.description: Displays the URL of the next article

prev-url:if.description: Display the enclosed text if article has the previous article

prev-url.description: Displays the URL of the previous article

mail.description: E-mail of user who left the comment

ip.description: IP address of user who left the comment. Displays only to website Administrators

com-edit.description: Link to the comment edit if it is allowed

com-del.description: Link to the comment removal if it is allowed

news_title.description: Link to the article when viewing the last comments. Tag is removed if comments are displayed in the article

news-title.description: It displays HTML-safe header of an article where the given comment belongs to. This tag is useful when you display customized comments and last comments

news-link.description: It displays the URL of an article where the comment belongs to. This tag is useful when you display customized comments and last comments

signature:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if user has set the signature in his profile

registration:user.description: Date of registration on the website

mass-action.description: Establishes the possibility of mass comments marking to perform mass actions on the site

fullname:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if the full name has been set by the user

not-fullname.description: Displays the enclosed text only if the full name has not been set by the user

land:if.description: Displays the enclosed text only if user has set the place of residence

not-land.description: Displays the enclosed text only if user has not set the place of residence

news-num:if.description: Displays the enclosed text only if user has news published by him

not-news-num.description: Displays the enclosed text only if user has no news published by him

comm-num:if.description: Displays the enclosed text only if user has comments

not-comm-num.description: Displays the enclosed text only if user has no comments

online.description: Displays the enclosed text only if user is online (20 minutes since the last visit)

offline.description: Displays the enclosed text only if user is offline

spam.description: Displays the enclosed text as a link to mark this user who left the comment as a spammer

commentsgroup.description: Displays the enclosed text if the comments was written by the user who belonged to specified groups

not-commentsgroup.description: Displays the enclosed text if the comments was written by the user who did not belong to specified groups

commentscount.description: Displays the enclosed text if comment number X is displayed, where X is the number of comment shown on the page. For example, [commentscount=1] text [/commentscount] will show the text when the first comment will be displayed on the page. This tag is useful if you want to choose the place to display ads between comments. For example, the code [commentscount=1,10] ad code [/commentscount] which is added to the end of the template will display ads after the first and the tenth comment

not-commentscount.description: Displays the enclosed text when any comments are displayed except the comment number X. This tag is useful if you want to show some design elements in all the article annotations except the specified ones, for example, if you do not want something to be displayed in the first article annotation

reply.description: Enclosed text is displayed as a link to a pop-up window for replying to a comment if tree-like comments are enabled. If they are disabled it inserts the given commentator's username to the new comment form

treecomments.description: Enclosed text is displayed if tree-like comments are enabled in script settings

not-treecomments.description: Enclosed text is displayed if tree-like comments are disabled in script settings

rootcomments.description: The enclosed text is displayed if the comment is the parent comment, rather than a response to any other comment

childrencomments.description: Display the enclosed text if the comment is a reply to another comment

replycount.description: It displays the number of replies for this comment

comments-author.description: Enclosed text is displayed if user who views the page is the author of the comment

not-comments-author.description: Enclosed text is displayed if user who views the page is not the author of the comment

news-author.description: Enclosed text is displayed if comment belongs to the author of the given article

not-news-author.description: Enclosed text is displayed if comment does not belong to the author of the given article

positive-comment.description: Enclosed text is displayed if the comment has positive rating

negative-comment.description: Enclosed text is displayed if the comment has negative rating

neutral-comment.description: Enclosed text is displayed if the comment has neutral rating

root.description: Displays a text between them when initially generating the menu template. These tags can be used to create the appearance of the menu. For example, to add some HTML elements, or elements which are not included in a category list

item.description: Represents a single category list item when forming category menu list. Text between these tags is displayed with HTML appearance customized for each list item

sub-prefix.description: Displays text between them as a subcategory prefix if a category is parental and it has subcategories

sub-suffix.description: Displays text between them as a subcategory suffix if a category is parental and it has subcategories

sub-item.description: Represents subcategories in a parent category if it has subcategories. This tag is used only within [item] [/item] tags

name.description: Displays a category name. This tag is used only within [item] [/item] tags

url.description: Displays a category URL. This tag is used only within [item] [/item] tags

icon.description: Displays a category icon. This tag is used only within [item] [/item] tags

news-count.description: Displays a number of articles of the category. This tag is used only within [item] [/item] tags

active.description: Displays a text between them if a viewed category or article is of the category from the menu. This tag is used only within [item] [/item] tags and is usually used to emphasize active categories form the menu

not-active.description: The enclosed text is displayed if the viewed category or article does not belong to a menu category. This tag can only be located inside the [item] [/item] tags and is used, for example, to output some information (e.g. links) only for non-active menu categories

isparent.description: Displays a text between them if a category is parental and contains subcategories. This tag is used only within [item] [/item] tags

allow-download.description: Displays the enclosed text if the website user is allowed to download files

not-allow-download.description: Displays the enclosed text if the website user is not allowed to download files

count:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if the file downloads counter is enabled in script settings

id:file.description: Displays the unique ID of the uploaded file. Information about this file is stored in the database

name:file.description: Displays the name of the uploaded file, or text specified as the name in [аttachment=...] tag in the text of the article

extension.description: Displays the extension of the attached file

md5.description: MD5 checksum of the uploaded file

date:file.description: Displays the date of the file upload, in the date format that is specified in your script

date:file-formated.description: Displays the date in the specified format. It allows you to display both the full date and its separate parts. The date format is set in accordance with the PHP format. For example, {date=d} tag displays the day of the article or comment publication, and {date=F} tag displays the name of the month. {date=d-m-Y H:i} displays the full date and time

count.description: The number of downloads of the file

online-view-link.description: Displays URL link to view the document online in the browser

allow-online.description: Displays the enclosed text, if the loaded document has supported format for online viewing

title:addcomments.description: Title that explains if this form is for adding or to editing the comment

not-logged.description: Displays the enclosed code if the user is not registered. For example, you can enclose login and e-mail fields in these tags. If these fields are not filled and the user is logged in, these data will be automatically taken from his/her profile

editor:addcomment.description: Displays BBCODE or WYSIWYG editor depending on the settings for adding the comment

sec_code:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if it was set to use CAPTCHA

recaptcha:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if reCAPTCHA type was enabled in settings

recaptcha.description: Displays reCAPTCHA widget if it was enabled in settings

question:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if question/answer system was enabled

question.description: Displays the question from the list of questions that was previously set

voted.description: Displays the enclosed text if the user has already voted, otherwise the text is hidden

not-voted.description: Displays the enclosed text if the user has not voted yet, otherwise the text is hidden

category:addarticle.description: Displays the field of the category selection where the article will belong to

xfinput.description: Displays your selected extra field in the form to add news to your desired location, where X is the name of an additional field for news

xfields.description: Displays extra fields (see the test template for details)

bbcode.description: Displays buttons for inserting tags in the article

urltag.description: Displays the enclosed text to edit User-friendly URL of the article (available for Administrator)

not-wysywyg.description: Displays the enclosed text if WYSIWYG is disabled. If it is enabled then the text will be removed

shortarea.description: Displays WYSIWYG editor to edit the article annotation

title:addarticle.description: Displays the title when editing the article

fullarea.description: Displays WYSIWYG editor when adding the full article

votetitle:addarticle.description: Displays the voting title when editing the article

frage.description: Displays the question from the voting when editing the article

votebody.description: Displays the list of possible answers when editing the article

short-preview.description: displays the text for the article annotation template

full-preview.description: displays the text for the full article template

static-preview.description: displays the text for the static page

prev-link.description: Creates a link to the previous page (if there is one)

next-link.description: Creates a link to the next page (if there is one)

pages.description: Creates a link to pages. For example: 1 2 3 4

registration:registratin.description: Displays the enclosed text when registering

validation.description: Displays the enclosed text during the validation

reg_code:registration.description: Shows the CAPTCHA code to the user

rate.description: Current rating of user's articles (formed automatically on the basis of the articles rating)

commentsrate.description: Displays the total rating of all comments of this user

editinfo.description: Displays existing summary information in the field when editing the profile

hidemail.description: Displays checkbox to hide an e-mail address

editsignature.description: Displays the user's signature formatted for editing

allowed-ip.description: IP from which the registration is allowed

time_limit:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if user is in the temporary group

time_limit.description: Displays the date before which the user is in the temporary group

rss.description: Link in the profile to the RSS feed of all the news of the user

ignore-list.description: List of users from the ignore list

profile-user-group.description: The enclosed text is displayed if the group of the user, whose profile is viewed, belongs to the group X, where X is the group number. Groups can also be listed by comma

not-profile-user-group.description: The enclosed text is displayed if the group of the user, whose profile is viewed, does not belong to the group X, where X is the group number

timezones.description: It shows list of available time zones, and allows user to choose time zone for his/her profile on the website

news-subscribe.description: Displays a checkbox for unsubscribing from comments and the number of signed publications

unsubscribe.description: Displays a checkbox for a subscription to receive notifications of new comments that are added to the news authored by the user

comments-reply-subscribe.description: Displays a checkbox for a subscription to receive notifications of new comments that are replies to comments of the user

pm:UserProfile.description: Link to writing a personal message to the user

email.description: Link to writing E-mail messages to the user

twofactor-auth.description: Displays the check box where user can enable or disable Two-Factor Authentication

searchmsg.description: Displays the message about the search results

searchmsg:if.description: Displays the encoded text if search has been performed

attachments.description: Text in these tags is displayed if attachment of files for feedback letters is allowed for a certain user group

text:limit.description: displays the text of the static page, without HTML formatting. Thus, the publication text is limited by X number of symbols

static:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if user is viewing the static page with a specified name

not-static.description: Displays the enclosed text if user does not view the static page with a specified name

pmlist:if.description: Displays the enclosed text if personal message list is viewed

newpm.description: Displays the enclosed text when writing new personal message

pm-limit.description: Maximum number of messages that user can store

proc-pm-limit.description: Used space in the inbox of the user as a percentage

pm-progress-bar.description: Bar of fullness of personal messages

editor:pm.description: Displays BBCODE or WYSIWYG editor depending on the settings for adding the comment

readpm.description: Displays text in the tags if the message is viewed

reply:pm.description: Link to reply to a message

ignore.description: Displays inks to add user to ignore list

tags:limit.description: Used to display the top 100 key tags from the database

votelist.description: Displays the enclosed text for those who has not voted yet

voteresult.description: Displays the enclosed text for those who has already voted

reason.description: Used to display the reasons of the website shutdown that you specified in settings

speedbar.description: In this section you can configure the display of the current location of the user on your website. This template uses only one tag {speedbar} which displays the location

shortrss.description: Displays the enclosed text if the short format of RSS news is enabled in script settings

fullrss.description: Displays the enclosed text if the full format of RSS news is enabled in script settings

yandexrss.description: Displays the enclosed text if the "Yandex news" format of RSS news is enabled in script settings

images:rss.description: Set of pictures for Yandex news

link:informer.description: Creates a link to the partners news

not-available.description: tag which is completely opposite to the available tag and displays text everywhere except the specified sections

sort.description: tags are responsible for the display of news sort order selection for user if it is allowed in script settings

smartphone.description: will display the text enclosed in tags if a visitor is browsing your site with a smartphone

not-smartphone.description: will display the text enclosed in tags if a visitor is browsing your site not with a smartphone

tablet.description: will display the text enclosed in tags if a visitor is browsing your site with a tablet

not-tablet.description: will display the text enclosed in tags if a visitor is browsing your site not with a tablet

desktop.description: will display the text enclosed in tags if a visitor is browsing your site with a desktop computer or laptop

not-desktop.description: will display the text enclosed in tags if a visitor is browsing your site not with a desktop computer or laptop

body: {customcomments id="${1:1,2,5-8}" category="${2:2,3,5-8}" author="${3:x}" days="${4:x}" template="${5:custom}" available="${6:global}" from="${7:0}" limit="${8:10}" order="${9:date}" sort="${10:desc}" cache="${11:yes}" categoryexclude="${12:2,7}" authorexclude="${13:admin,test}"}$0
customcomments.description: allows to display comments in a customized form in any place of the website. This tag is used for the additional display of comments and can be used, for example, to display last comments on the main page of your website, etc
